option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
filenames of the rawacf format files. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.
files are in the raw (dat format.
filename of the raw (dat) format file.

synopsis.p: Tests the integrity of raw (dat) or rawacf format files by reading them and printing the contents.

description.p: Tests the integrity of raw (dat) or rawacf format files by reading them and printing the contents.
The contents are written to standard output

example.description: Test the integrity of the file "20040830.gbr.dat", paginating using more.
